title: Calories in a 6-Piece McNugget
meta_description: Learn calories in a 6 piece mcnugget: 250 kcal total, with full breakdown of protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and tweaks for sauces or alternatives.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Chicken McNuggets, breaded white meat chicken, fried in vegetable oil blend, no dipping sauce included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe updates, portion size, and frying method. Check McDonald's official sources for current values.

quick_answer.text: A 6-piece serving of Chicken McNuggets provides 250 kcal and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add one BBQ sauce packet (shared across 6 pieces, ~8 kcal per piece equivalent)
Baked instead of fried (lower oil absorption per piece)
With spicy buffalo coating (added seasoning per piece)

faqs.q: How many calories in a 6 piece mcnugget?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for a standard 6-piece Chicken McNugget serving.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 6 piece mcnuggets?
faqs.a: About 15 g of protein in 6 pieces.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a 6 piece mcnugget?
faqs.a: Around 560 mg of sodium, mainly from breading and seasoning.
Roughly 42 kcal per single Chicken McNugget.

faqs.q: Do 6 piece mcnuggets have trans fats?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat in standard McDonald's Chicken McNuggets.
